text: Ante Pavić was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Michael Mmoh won the title after defeating Jordan Thompson 6–3, 7–6(7–4) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Columbus Challenger - Singles
title: 2018 Columbus Challenger – Singles
